content: crochet baby octopus gather your supplies cotton weight yarn medium weight ~53g black or contrasting yarn size 3 5 mm e hook tapestry needle fiberfill for stuffing scissors stitch marker optional abbreviations this crochet baby octopus was originally designed for neonatal care slip_stitch slip_stitch units to comfort preemie and hospitalized newborns the little legs chain chain stitch are perfect to keep hands busy and can be used as a stress reliever single_crochet single_crochet for any age the octopus is worked in two sections the head and half_double_crochet half_double_crochet then the tentacles each round is worked continuously around 3hdc 3 half_double_crochet without turning stitch marker can be placed at beginning of round into the same stitch and moved up as rounds are worked blo back loop only 2sc 2 single_crochet gauge is not critical to this project this pattern creates a octopus into the same stitch that is approximately 3 inches wide with tentacles design to be no increase longer than 8 inches long outstretched to increase or decrease the dimensions you can adjust your hook size decrease single_crochet 2 stitches together body decrease round 1 create a magic_ring with 6 stitches increase increase round 2 2sc into each stitch around 12 decrease decrease round 3 *single_crochet 1 2sc increase into next stitch * start of a repeat repeat from * to end of the round 18 notes round 4 *single_crochet 2 2sc into next stitch repeat from * to end of the round 24 round 5 *single_crochet 3 2sc into next stitch repeat from * to the end of the round 30 round 6 *single_crochet 4 2sc into next stitch repeat from * to the end 36 round 7 *single_crochet 5 2sc into next stitch repeat from * to end 42 twinknits 2021 crochet - octopus baby pattern page 2 of 2 body - continuted round 8-12 single_crochet in each stitch around 42 round 13 *single_crochet in each of the next 5 stitches decrease decrease repeat from * to the end 36 round 14-15 single_crochet in each stitch around 36 round 16 *single_crochet 4 2sctog repeat from * to the end 30 round 17-18 single_crochet in each stitch around 30 round 19 working in the back loop only blo *single_crochet 3 2sctog repeat from * to the end 24 round 20 *single_crochet 2 2sctog repeat from * to the end 18 round 21 stuff head with fiberfill pack tightly then *single_crochet 2sctog repeat from * to the end 12 round 22 *single_crochet 2sctog repeat from * to the end 6 finish off slip_stitch and finish off leaving a long end about 3-4 inches long using a tapestry needle weave the long end of the tail around through the last 6 stitches of the round pull and fasten close the bottom of the body weave in ends tentacles join the yarn with a slip_stitch to any of the front loop stitches created on round 19 tentacles will be worked around every 4th front loop of the 19th round leg 1 chain
